titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rockwell Kent Ephemera Collection, 1920-1995
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2009

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Rockwell Kent Ephemera Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Primarily printed material relating to or including Kent's work.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Rockwell Kent (1882-1971) was a painter, illustrator and printmaker.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Primarily printed material relating to or including Kent's work, including exhibition catalogs, christmas cards, promotional material and more.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: For more information on, and materials produced by the Open Road Inc., see

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Some published materials were removed from this collection to be cataloged. For works illustrated by Rockwell Kent, please consult the

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection Processed by Laura Streett, June 2009.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This is an artificial collection compiled by the Vassar College Library over a number of years.
At least some portion of the collection was a gift of Arthur H. Groten.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rockwell Kent Ephemera Collection, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

did.unittitle: Christmas card fragment — "Still the breath does move...,"

Catalogue for the Center for Music, Drama and Art exhibit of Kent Christmas cards,
Christie's auction catalogue — "Rockwell Kent and Other Modern Illustrators,"
Advertising card for Kent, reading, "Architectural and General Designing and Rendering in Any Medium,"

Advertising card for Asgaard Flour,
Bookmark for the American Cancer Society,
Advertising card for Kent "On Earth Peace" Stamp,
Christmas card — [Angel over sheath of wheat],
Christmas card — "Books Make the Home,"

Christmas card — "To the Universe,"

Christmas card — "On Earth Peace,"
